name: 本·金顿
introduction: Ben Kindon graduated from the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts (WAAPA) in 2015.Whilst at WAAPA, Ben notably played the title role in his graduating production of MACBETH, showcasing his impressive stage skill and commanding presence.Towards the end of Ben's final year of drama school, he was cast as one of the young lead roles in the highly anticipated mini-series for the ABC, BARRACUDA. Directed by Robert Connolly, Ben plays the role of "Martin Taylor". The mini-series will air in mid 2016 and also stars Rachel Griffiths and Tilda Cobham-Hervey, playing Ben's mother and sister respectively.- IMDb Mini Biography By: United Management
